title: Bison Sausage, Apple and Sage Strata

Ingredients.4: 2  tart cooking apples, cored and chopped

Ingredients.9: 1 (12 ounce) loaf firm-textured French or Italian bread, cut into 1-inch cubes

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Coat a 3-quart rectangular baking dish with cooking spray; set aside. Cook bison sausage and onion over medium heat in an extra-large skillet until bison sausage is brown. Add apple and cook for 5 more minutes. Drain off fat.

Directions.2: Whisk eggs, milk, sage, and pepper in a large bowl.

Directions.3: Place bread cubes in prepared baking dish. Top with bison sausage mixture and the cheese. Gently mix to evenly distribute ingredients. Pour egg mixture over bread mixture.

Directions.4: Bake, uncovered, for 40 to 45 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving.
